public interface IExtendable
Adds the ability to add/remove capabilites to an object that implements the ICapable interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    <T> T getExtension​(java.lang.Class<T> cap)
    Get the requested extension if available.
    java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> getExtensions()
    Return all extension types supported
    <T> T putExtension​(java.lang.Class<T> cap, T impl)
    Add a new extension.
    <T> T removeExtension​(java.lang.Class<T> cap)
    Remove a capability.

  • Method Details

    • getExtensions

      java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> getExtensions()
      Return all extension types supported

    • getExtension

      <T> T getExtension​(java.lang.Class<T> cap)
      Get the requested extension if available.
      Parameters:
      class - of the requested capability
      Returns:
      the capability object or null if the cability is not available

    • putExtension

      <T> T putExtension​(java.lang.Class<T> cap, T impl)
      Add a new extension.
      Parameters:
      cap - the extension to add
      Returns:
      the added extension implementation

    • removeExtension

      <T> T removeExtension​(java.lang.Class<T> cap)
      Remove a capability.
      Parameters:
      cap - the capability to remove
